urgent.action: Fix HTTP to HTTPS canonical redirect - http://www.konacoffeedonut.com/en has 109 impressions at position 11.2 with 0% CTR. Google is indexing both HTTP and HTTPS versions, diluting authority.
urgent.reasoning: 109 impressions wasted on non-canonical URL. Implement 301 redirect from HTTP to HTTPS immediately.

urgent.action: Optimize homepage title/meta for 'donuts near me' and 'donuts Waikiki' - currently at position 9.8 with 21 impressions and 0% CTR.
urgent.reasoning: Position 9.8 is striking distance. With 21 impressions and 0 clicks, your snippet is not compelling.

urgent.action: Audit mobile experience - only 6.1% impressions from mobile is abnormally low for a local food business.
urgent.reasoning: Local coffee/donut shops typically see 60%+ mobile traffic. Your 6.1% suggests mobile ranking or UX issues.

quickWins.action: Add 'donuts near me in Waikiki' and 'best donuts Waikiki' as H2 headers on homepage. Include FoodEstablishment schema.
quickWins.reasoning: Position 9.8 with 21 impressions - moving to top 5 could yield 3-5 clicks/day.

quickWins.action: Create 'Coffee in Waikiki' landing page targeting 'coffee near me' and 'coffee shops near me open now' queries.
quickWins.reasoning: Position 13.7 for 'coffee near me' and position 2 for 'coffee shops near me open now' - consolidate signals.

quickWins.action: Update homepage title to 'Donuts & Kona Coffee in Waikiki | Opening Feb 25' - create urgency.
quickWins.reasoning: Generic 'donuts' at position 10.4 - adding location specificity improves CTR for Waikiki searchers.

quickWins.action: Optimize /ko/about-kona-coffee meta tags for Korean tourists - 31 impressions at position 10 with 0 CTR.
quickWins.reasoning: Korean page has visibility but no clicks. Add Korean-specific keywords like '와이키키 커피'.

opportunities.action: Create 'Best Donuts in Waikiki' blog post before opening - target tourists researching their trip.
opportunities.reasoning: No ranking content for tourist-intent queries. Waikiki visitors often pre-research food options.

opportunities.action: Ensure Google Business Profile is fully optimized with opening date, menu, photos. Enable reservations/waitlist.
opportunities.reasoning: GBP is critical for 'near me' queries. Opening in 2 days - maximize local pack visibility.

opportunities.action: Create Japanese-language page targeting Japanese tourists - 1.2% traffic from Japan, but Waikiki has huge Japanese tourist population.
opportunities.reasoning: Japanese tourists are a major Waikiki demographic. A /ja/ page could capture pre-trip research queries.

opportunities.action: Publish 'Story of Kona Coffee' educational content - /en/about-kona-coffee page ranks at position 4.75 with good potential.
opportunities.reasoning: Educational content builds authority. Position 4.75 can reach top 3 with optimization.

insights.observation: Desktop dominates at 91.5% impressions - unusual for local food business
insights.suggestion: Investigate mobile ranking issues and improve mobile page speed

insights.observation: Brand term 'kona coffee donut' has 42.1% CTR at position 1.1 - excellent brand recognition
insights.suggestion: Leverage brand strength by cross-linking to branded content

insights.observation: Opening Feb 25 (2 days away) - critical time for pre-launch visibility
insights.suggestion: Focus all SEO efforts on local pack and 'near me' queries for opening day

insights.observation: Japan shows 1.2% traffic with Korean pages getting impressions - tourist SEO opportunity
insights.suggestion: Prioritize Japanese content before tourist season; optimize existing Korean pages
